Package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle

Class XpathFileGeneratorAuditListener

java.lang.Object
com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.AbstractAutomaticBean
com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.XpathFileGeneratorAuditListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuditListener, Configurable, Contextualizable, EventListener
public class XpathFileGeneratorAuditListener extends AbstractAutomaticBean implements AuditListener
Generates suppressions.xml file, based on violations occurred. See issue #102

  • Nested Class Summary
